pr_title: Added ability for custom manifest entries in MANIFEST.MF

timeline.bodyText: Configuration of the Mojo is really legacy at this point so there isn't much point in adding more. All Quarkus configuration is now done via the Quarkus Config System (of which ManifestConfig which you have already changed is a part)
timeline.author: geoand

timeline.bodyText: @geoand As we will just be using the property, should I simplify these separators to just ":" and "="?

timeline.bodyText: @aloubyansky @stuartwdouglas are you OK with this format?
timeline.author: geoand

replies.bodyText: I think this should be represented as a Map, rather than a fully de-typed format.
